#summary EveOS coding standard

== General ==

  * Line length - 75 chars + max 2 symbols if needed

== Assembly language ==

  * Always use underscore to separate words in names
  * Use underscore in front of a name for global values

== C++ ==

  * User camelCase at all times
  * Class names begin with upper case
  * Mehod and function names begin with lower case

  * g prefix for global variables (e.g. gGlobal)
  * m prefix for members (e.g. mMember)
